definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ju Jdg 15:4 tail, also (fig.) end, stump (NH id., As. zibbatu Hom:NS 368, Eth. zanab: Ar. d-anadun, Aram. duwnbo0, [[דּוּנְבָּא]], [[דַּנְבָּא]])—´[[ז]] abs. Ju Jdg 15:4, Jdg 15:4 + 5 t.; sf. [[זְנׇבוֹ]] Job 40:17; pl. [[זְנׇבוֹת]] Ju Jdg 15:4; cstr. [[זַנְבוֹת]] Is 7:4; —

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: tail of fox Ju Jdg 15:4, Jdg 15:4, Jdg 15:4, of serpent Ex 4:4 (J), of hippopot. Job 40:17;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig. of common people, opp. to rulers Is 9:13, Is 19:15 (in both, [[ראׁשׁ וְזׇנׇב]], ‖[[כִּפָּה וְאַגְמוֹן]]; Is 9:14 is incorrect gloss); of subject-people (opp. [[ראׁשׁ]]) De 28:13, De 28:44.
end, stump (of firebrand, [[אוּד]]) in metaph. Is 7:4.
